artist: Artist: Christo; Publisher: Graphik International, Stuttgart., Germany
description: sketch at top of monument at left with sculptures of figures, extending into background, covered with white folded material, wrapped with threads; trees in ULC; photograph of monument with sculptures of figures in LLC; map in LRC
markings: left edge above map, in pencil: A.P. IX
medium: Color lithograph with collage of folded paper, textile, yarn, thread, and printed city map on paper mounted on board

signed: left edge above map, in pencil: Christo
title: Wrapped Mur des Réformateurs, Project for Geneva
